metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7300 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, has an aout_link_add_symbols function in bfd/aoutx.hthat is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read (off-by-one) because ofan incomplete check for invalid string offsets while loading symbols,leading to a GNU linker (ld) program crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
